snippet: The arrests suggest that the government is embracing a new strategy against politically motivated suicides: punishing friends and relatives of those who self-immolate.
abstract: Authorities in northwest China detain seven people they say organized fatal self-immolation of Tibetan villager in October, photographed his burning body and then sent images abroad; arrests suggest that government is embracing new strategy against politically motivated suicides of punishing friends and relatives of those who self-immolate.
lead_paragraph: The arrests suggest that the government is embracing a new strategy against politically motivated suicides: punishing friends and relatives of those who self-immolate.

headline.seo: China Arrests 7 in New Effort to Stop Tibetan Self-Immolations
headline.main: China Arrests 7 in New Effort to Stop Tibetan Self-Immolations
headline.print_headline: China Arrests 7 in New Effort to Stop Tibetan Self-Immolations
